price: Kandi nibaguhinyura (yewe Muhamadi), umenye ko na mbere yabo, abantu ba Nuhu, aba Adi n’aba Thamudu bahinyuye (Intumwa zabo).
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wathamūdu
